original_text: In the place where they kill the burnt offering shall they kill the trespass offering: and the blood thereof shall he sprinkle round about upon the altar.
korean_text: 번제물을 잡는 곳에서 속건제의 번제물을 잡을 것이요 제사장은 그 피를 제단 사방에 뿌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: In the place where they kill the burnt offering
shall they kill the trespass offering
shall he sprinkle round about upon the altar
